member.name: P:atcTimeseriesStatistics.atcTimeseriesStatistics.Description
member.summary: Returns 'Computes statistics of a timeseries and stores them as attributes'

member.name: M:atcTimeseriesStatistics.atcTimeseriesStatistics.Initialize
member.summary: Add operations to atcDataAttributes so they can be computed as needed

member.name: M:atcTimeseriesStatistics.atcTimeseriesStatistics.InitializeShared
member.summary: Add operations to atcDataAttributes so they can be computed as needed
member.remarks: Same effect as the non-shared Initialize

member.name: P:atcTimeseriesStatistics.atcTimeseriesStatistics.AvailableOperations
member.summary: Definitions of statistics supported by this class.

member.name: M:atcTimeseriesStatistics.atcTimeseriesStatistics.Open(System.String,atcData.atcDataAttributes)
member.summary: Compute the specified operation and set its value in the Attributes of the specified datasets
member.param: atcTimeseries or atcDataGroup to compute aOperationName on
member.returns: True if some computation was done, False if no operation or datasets were specified
member.remarks: For most operations, several other attributes are also computed: see ComputeStatistics
